cards.description: Destroy this card then deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. If this card is sent to the Grave: Draw 1 card.
Deal 20 damage to a Champion and return this card to your hand.
Deal 20 damage to a Champion then destroy this card. If this card is destroyed add 1 copy of 'Crimson Cataclysm' from your deck to your hand.
If this card is discarded or destroyed: deal 10 damage to a Champion.
If this card is discarded: Heal 10 damage from a Champion. If this card is destroyed: Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
If this card is Discarded or Destroyed: you can Destroy 1 Air Equipment you control then draw 2 cards.
Destroy this card then add 1 'Tidal Wave' from Grave to Hand. If this card is destroyed: Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
Return 1 'Vital Bloom' from your field to your hand then deal 10 damage to this Champion and 30 damage to a Champion.
Return 1 'Withering Thorns' from your field to your hand then heal 20 damage from this Champion.
Destroy 1 'Catalyst Orb' you control then heal 20 damage from the Champion that was equipped with that 'Catalyst Orb'.
Destroy all 'Grenade's you control and deal 30 damage to a Champion for each 'Grenade' destroyed.
